description: Hector Duff was honoured for teaching schoolchildren about his experiences in World War Two.
title: Hector Duff: Isle of Man's 'true legend' war veteran dies aged 101
title_page: Hector Duff: Isle of Man's 'true legend' war veteran dies aged 101 - BBC News
maintext: "He will leave behind a strong legacy which will remind us all about the horrors of war, the sacrifice that so many of his generation gave, and the legion of brave warriors that Hector has been called up to join," he said.
